## IQNameFactory.createQNameFromString() method

Creates a QName from a string.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createQNameFromString(qname: string): QName;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  qname | string | String to create a QName from |

<b>Returns:</b>

QName

## Exceptions

[QNameError](./alfresco-data-model.qnameerror.md) This exception is thrown when an error occurs when creating a QName. This can happen because of e.g.: Invalid syntax, a namespace URI or prefix that does not exist, ...
